content:
Hi, my team is starting work building C-CDAs for our in-house EMR for MU15 certification purposes. Does anyone know good open source projects or paid solution to provide an abstract ion to the base implementation guide? I started reading through the IG and have been coming across projects like these: https://github.com/projectcypress/cdatools and https://github.com/amida-tech/blue-button but these seem no longer maintained and unreliable. I'm looking for someone who's done work to abstract the sections/entries of the C-CDA into simpler data structures that I can create based on my own database used for our EMR. Thanks!

PS: I'm also looking into the CCDA on FHIR project as an avenue as well so if anyone has experience implementing off of that let me know!
